name: THIRSTY ROBOT
description:
This is thirsty robot, he  hard-worker, love his family, and he’ll do anything to pursuit his closest person’s happiness.

This artwork was inspired by an image about an old man who is drinking while he take a rest from his job, he seems like a construction worker who is tired after working on a hot day.

It showing a lot of dedication on his work and also to his beloved ones.

Animated GIF
3000x3000 pixel
300 DPI
